name: Divine Smite

casting_time.trigger: which you take immediately after hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

description: The target takes an extra 2d8 Radiant damage from the attack. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is a Fiend or an Undead.
at_higher_levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each spell slot level above 1.
